Interface CardGame

public interface CardGame
An interface for a general card game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    Checks for end of game.

    Returns the index of the current player.

    • start

      void start(Deck deck)
      Starts the card game.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck of (shuffled) cards to be used in this game

    • makeMove

      void makeMove(int playerIdx, int[] cardIdx)
      Makes a move by the player.
      Parameters:
      playerIdx - the index of the player who makes the move
      cardIdx - the list of the indices of the cards selected by the player

    • checkMove

      void checkMove(int playerIdx, int[] cardIdx)
      Checks the move made by the player.
      Parameters:
      playerIdx - the index of the player who makes the move
      cardIdx - the list of the indices of the cards selected by the player

    • endOfGame

      boolean endOfGame()
      Checks for end of game.
      Returns:
      true if the game ends; false otherwise
